amendment.description: Amendment establishes minimum privacy standards for "Smart Meters" and their use in the smart grid.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34 printed in House Report 114-359 to establishe minimum privacy standards for "Smart Meters" and their use in the smart grid.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Grayson.
